Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using cells expressing wild-type or E163K mutant DJ-1.

Readout description.Result Description: E163K mutant failed to protect against oxidative stress and showed reduced mitochondrial redistribution.
E163K mutant retained capacity to mitigate mitochondrial stress and proteasomal impairment.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control for functional assays.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells without DJ-1 expression were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal mitochondrial redistribution and oxidative stress protection observed in wild-type DJ-1.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Failure to protect against oxidative stress or reduced mitochondrial redistribution compared to wild-type.
